sentences.english: Imperialism picked the resources of colony.
sentences.chinese: 帝国主义搜括殖民地的资源。

definition: to rake in (money)/to plunder/to milk people dry
lit. the fat and wealth of the people (idiom); the nation's hard-won wealth (esp. as an object of unscrupulous exploitation)/the people's blood, sweat and tears
to tax by force and extort levies (idiom); to screw taxes out of the people by force
to gather (people)/to collect (talent)/to come to an end
to store/to have sth in storage
state treasury, also written 帑臧[tang3 zang1]
to accumulate/to gather/to amass wealth by heavy taxation or other unscrupulous means/(science) convergent
silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
land tax/money and grain (given as tax or tribute)
